contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 13, 2015 D Darwen March and Hymn Tune Contest
Darwen March and Hymn Tune Contest 0 March & Hymn Contest (Separate Points)
darwen-march-and-hymn-tune-contest
Market Square, Darwen, Lancashire 1st Edition
Hymn tune contest - 1st Ashton-under-Lyne, 2nd Haslingden and Helmshore, 3rd Hawk Green. Best section 2 hymn - Glossop. Best section 3 hymn - Rivington and Adlington. Best section 4 hymn - Brindle. Best section 2 march - Eccleston, 2nd Farnworth and Walkden. Best section 3 march - 1st Hawk Green, 2nd Greenalls. Best section 4 march - 1st Brindle, 2nd Cadishead. Best soloist - solo cornet Ashton-under-Lyne. 12 bands competed.
Sept. 14, 2015, 8:13 a.m. Sept. 23, 2017, 7:14 a.m.
1 Ashton Band Philip Chalk
2 Haslingden & Helmshore Band David Holland March: High Command
3 Glossop Old Band Les Webb
4 Hawk Green (Marple) Band Neil Hewson
5 Greenalls Band Philip Boardman
6 Coppull and Standish Band Matthew Stringer
7 Rivington and Adlington Band Malcolm Wilson
8 Eccleston Brass John Wood
9 Parr (St. Helens) Band John Ludden
9 Brindle Band Graham Smith
11 Cadishead Band Craig McFarland
12 Farnworth and Walkden Band Mark Wildie
